info.description: This is the API for the SOS Kotopes project. It provides endpoints for managing the database of animals in need of help.
info.title: SOS Kotopes API

post.description: Refresh token should be in cookies (login put it there)

get.description: Fetch a list of keepers based on optional filters and pagination
Retrieves the details of a keeper by its ID

delete.description: Deletes a keeper by its ID.

patch.description: Updates the keeper details such as description, price, location, etc.

get.description: Fetch reviews of a keeper based on optional pagination
Get favourite posts of user by id
get.summary: Get favourite posts of user by id

get.description: Get all comments for a post

post.description: Create a comment for a post

delete.description: Delete a comment for a post

patch.description: Update a comment for a post

ApiKeyAuthBasic.description: Authorization token in the format "Bearer your_token"
ApiKeyAuthBasic.name: Authorization
